name: Cavescape (itch) (jRei) (jRei)
description:
An Entry made for Houdini Game Jam 2020

You are a traveler who tries to figure out what's happening in a mysterious cave.

It is a full story and play through should take about 10-15 minutes.

If any issues, try pressing "R", it should respawn. Unfortunately it's not a solution to all problems, hopefully there wont be too much bugs ...
